data.name: GUNJACK
data.description:
“‘Gunjack’ is one of the best Gear VR launch titles.” 5/5 -Upload VR

“…one of the best-looking things on the Gear VR.” -Polygon

“Gunjack sets the bar for Gear VR turret shooters.” 4/5 –Road To VR 

Gunjack is a visually stunning virtual reality arcade shooter set in the sprawling EVE science fiction universe. Jump into your heavy weapons turret, power up your guns, and defend your mining platform from deadly waves of enemy ships determined to blast you and your crew into oblivion. With its intuitive controls and intense, immersive action, Gunjack is the ultimate pick-up-and-play VR experience.

Gunjack supports English, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Korean.

NOTICE: Gaming experience will be improved on later generation phones and we recommend Android 5.1.1 or greater for best performance.

Use of this application is governed by CCP’s end user license agreement. This is available at http://www.gunjack.com/eula/

changelog.change_log: Ammo will now automatically reload once it has been depleted.
Gunjack is now compatible with Android 6.0 Marshmallow.

Gunjack now supports English, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Korean.
Gunjack est disponible en anglais, allemand, français, italien, espagnol et coréen.
Gunjack supporta inglese, tedesco, francese, italiano, spagnolo e coreano.
Gunjack unterstützt Englisch, Deutsch, Französisch, Italienisch, Spanisch und Koreanisch.
Gunjack está disponible en inglés, alemán, francés, italiano, español y coreano.
Gunjack은 영어, 독일어, 프랑스어, 이탈리아어, 스페인어 및 한국어를 지원합니다.
